EmailTemplate.description: notifies customer that contract has been received
EmailTemplate.name: DOER Customer - Contract Receipt
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to BlueWave - Your Solar Loan contract is complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
Welcome to BlueWave!
Your BlueWave Solar Loan contract has been received. If you have a co-applicant the contract has been redirected to their email address for their signature. You will receive a copy of your fully executed contract after both signatures have been registered.
We're always here if you have any questions about your Solar Loan terms and conditions.
Thank you again from all of us here at BlueWave and Avidia.
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 customercare@bluewavesolar.com
